name: The Last Bison
description:
In The Last Bison, enter an ancient civilisation that has been ravaged by some unknown tragedy - find and collect the clues to the lost story of this place, from the back of your trusty bison friend. 

Controls:

WASD - Move

Space - Jump

Tab - Open Journal

E - Interact/Collect Murals to add to Journal

Return - Mount/Dismount Bison (while near him)

Esc - Exit game (while in journal view)

The Last Bison is my first solo game project! It was my honours project for University, and was my first time using Unity for a project. It's meant to be a short, linear experience but I encourage you to take as long as you like exploring.

While I've taken every precaution to make sure the game is bug-free, there more than likely will have been some bugs slip through the cracks.

Regardless, I hope you enjoy! :)
